scripts.bootstrap: node clean-bootstrap && npm run javascript-build && parcel watch ./src/bootstrap/main.* --no-source-maps --dist-dir public/dist
scripts.bootstrap-build: node clean-bootstrap && npm run javascript-build && parcel build ./src/bootstrap/main.* --no-source-maps --dist-dir public/dist
scripts.build-upload: npm run javascript-build && npm run upload
scripts.javascript-build: npm run javascript-main-build && npm run javascript-rbs-build
